name: Mrs Pellet Gun -Shoot them all
description:
here is a fun adventure and action game, "Mrs Pellet Gun -Shoot them all" you will kill and hunt ennemies, mrs bullet is here now you can play it and enjoy it, it's a great game, now is available for you to install.
you can start shooting now with mr bullet

Play mrs bullet & tap quickly to pass many challenging missions,
at each level a new shooting slug stage appear.
Features of Mrs Pellet :
- Creates a lot of suspense.
- Simple & Beautiful graphics designed.
- Makes slug control smooth.

are you a good shooter?
Let's find out!

Shoot at enemies, buy new weapons and armor.
Put on as many scores as possible.

Headshots double your points.

Enjoy ;)
